{"id":999574616,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1689876244,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"205 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/999574616/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"9.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int fxn(int n, vector<int>&dp){\n        if(n<0)return INT_MAX;\n        if(n==0)return 0;\n        if(dp[n]!=-1)return dp[n];\n        int mnm =n;\n        for(int i=1;i*i<=n;i++){\n        mnm=min(mnm,fxn(n-(i*i),dp)); \n        }\n        dp[n]=mnm+1;\n        return mnm+1;\n    }\n    \n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        vector<int>dp(n+1,-1);\n        return fxn(n,dp);\n    }\n};\n\n\n//     int numSquares(int n){\n//         int arr[]=new int[n+1];\n//         return helper(n,arr);\n//     }\n    \n//     public : int helper(int n,int arr[]){\n//         if(n<0) return Integer.MAX_VALUE;  //Taking min later on\n//         if(n==0) return 0;\n        \n//         if(arr[n]>0) return arr[n];\n        \n//         int min=n;\n        \n//         for(int i=1;i*i<=n;i++){\n//             min=Math.min(min,helper(n-(i*i),arr));\n//         }\n//         arr[n]=min+1;\n//         return min+1;\n//     }\n// };\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
